TextAsset.value: Welcome to Namco High, ${slot:playerName}! Please click here or press Enter to progress through the game.
Volume may be adjusted and the store may be accessed via the Options Menu in the bottom right.
You can skip read text by pressing the Fast Forward button above that. It will light up when you can use it.
Thanks for playing, and have fun!
Here's the first thing you need to know.
My Uncle is the King of all Cosmos...
My cousin is the Prince. He's really good at rolling stuff up.
If there's something you can think of, he's rolled it.
He's kind of a big deal.
I really look up to him...
But I also kinda think of him as a rival.
Anyway, I got to thinking... Maybe rolling runs in the family, if you know what I mean.
So I tried it out. Took a roll around school grounds.
I even waited until lunch hour so I wasn't bothering anyone.
I picked up a lot of stuff! Textbooks...
Some mix CDS (who has CDs anymore?!)...
Lots of tasty food (our school is pretty international, y'know? Actually it's pretty intergalactic)...
A Namco High varsity jacket (It was too big for me)...
Sports equipment, like wrestleballs and stuff…
Really it was the whole marching band...
Some cars in the parking lot...
I wasn't trying to cause a problem...
But maybe I got a little carried away.
Minus all those incredibly specific details.
My point is: I just want to make it out of high school alive.
But instead, I ended up here...
This is where Namco High's most notorious...
I try not to look anyone in the eye. Who knows what these troublemakers will do?
I just hope no one talks to me...
You have your own special weirdness, don't you?
Don't be so rude! To, uh, this weirdo ...
Oooh, you better not make the goody two-drills mad ...
he'll sic his pops on you!
And just what, exactly, is wrong with being a goody two-shoes?
A goody two-shoes has the makings of an exemplary student!
Y-yeah... ! D-don't be so mean! There’s nothing wrong with it!
What's wrong is that it's super BO-riiiiing! YAWN!
HEY! I think it's brave to try to stick to the straight and narrow... Know what I mean, boss?
The straight and narrow? Heh. Look around you. We're in detention. It's already too late. Too late for all of us...
I don't think it's ever too late... But maybe it's a mistake to battle destiny...
Yeah ... Like maybe we're all destined to be LOSERS.
Given enough data, I COULD construct a mathematical model with a high level of predictive accuracy ... But the criteria for getting out of detention are unclear at best.
Tch. No thanks. I'd rather figure it out as I go.
Yes I agree, classmate! Let's all go on an unpredictable adventure likely to end in criminal activity!
Did someone say ... Vast global conspiracy all around us every waking moment of every day?!
GALAGA DOES NOT THINK ANYBODY SAID THAT
(They're all arguing with each other. They've totally forgotten about me.)
(I've gotta admit, they're not at all what I expected. Well ... Some of them.)
(You know ... Now that I think about it ... )
(It must take someone really scary to keep these students in line ... )
(What could possibly scare this scary guy?!)
(Weren't they just yelling at each other?!)
And I see some new faces.
Rest assured… I’m memorizing all of them.
My fellow faculty member here is King… called such because he is King of the ring.
Here he is the King of DETENTION!
Ahem. King has prepared a statement, which I am to read to you.
"I became a wrestler because I wanted to raise money for the children. Good children. Not like you miscreants."
"It's the reason I've become a part-time teacher here at Namco High."
"This place is like the orphanage where I grew up, only back home we were abandoned by our families."
"This room is an orphanage for people abandoned by their better judgement!!"
(What is Dig Dug even saying... This man, King... Is he even a man?)
"There was a time when I was forbidden from fighting students…"
(Wait… is principal Dig Dug ALSO scared of this man?!)
"Now I can do whatever I want!!"
"So let me know if you want to have a go. I'm ready!"
"Lucky for you, I'm not a tyrant! We will work TOGETHER to mold you into better students. Students of TOMORROW."
"You will be like clay in my formidable paws."
"Some of you seem to think that you have reached rock-bottom..."
"But I assure you... It could be much worse."
"I grew up on the STREETS. I fought everyone... and everything. I was undisciplined... Raw... Angry... I ate RATS …"
"You have it easy. Or you would, if you weren't in here with me."
I don't know where he’s going with this. Let's take roll!
When do we start our morning drills?
But I may have to leave soon ... I have responsibilities to attend to.
THIS COMPLETELY NORMAL STUDENT IS HERE
AND READY TO MAKE SOME TROUBLED FRIENDS
I've been collecting some very interesting data...
I was destined to be here...
Have I ever told you I'm a cat person?
Ah… and those weird transfer students…
Er… okay… where was I. Oh… Davesprite!
There's hope for you lowlifes yet!
Since we have a new inmate ... Er, student ... I'm obligated to explain how detention works.
You did your crime, now you serve the time!
You can shorten your sentence in one of two ways.
The first is to join a club to show your school spirit.
If we can see that you care and we are impressed by the amount of effort you put forth, your afternoons will be set free next week.
It's a lot of hard work, but you're sure to learn something about yourself!
The second is to let King try his new wrestling move on you.
He calls it the "Student Body Reformer".
One time on the receiving end of it and you'll never want to cause trouble again!
(OF COURSE NOT! We all… want to live… !!)
H-haha ... How about that old school spirit! Go Namco High ... !
Even in your youth, you have wisdom… don’t wrestle him. Not even for funsies.
(Because it absolutely constitutes some kind of harassment!)
Eh? King? Oh, you think our new student has something to share? Do you have something to say, ${slot:playerName}?
(Is he psychic?! Is it some kind of ... teacher power?!)
Hmmm. I think he likes you.
Orrrrr he hates you. Hard to tell.
I encourage you to make friends, ${slot:playerName}!
They’re all enrolled in at least one of the school clubs..
King says: "Friendship is very important! Sometimes the man you are about to kill in cold blood can become your greatest friend."
You must look deep into their eyes to know this.
I see friendship in your eyes, ${slot:playerName}. Good luck!
